markdown: ###### Minor positive reputation with [Neketaka](/neketaka/);[Nomad's Brigandine](/nomadsBrigandine/) | rewardname2 = | reward2 = | rewardname3 = | reward3 = | rewardname4 = | reward4 = | rewardname5 = | reward5 = | rewardname6 = | reward6 = | prev = | conc = | next = Bounty - Flamewalker Vessali | internalname = BOUNTY_TSK_Mystic | guid = 50fca16f-db33-404a-a6ee-e9e30212b798 }} '''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [bounty](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireQuestsBounties/) in {{poe2}}. ## Synopsis Beina, a dwarf mystic responsible for conning or killing anyone who gets too close. There's a handsome bounty on her head. Beina sounds like the type to keep moving, but she's been seen tarrying around an island southwest of Hasongo. ## Walkthrough * Beina is found on an island southwest of [Hasongo](/hasongo/), at the coordinates 15째 43' S, 38째 28' E. She is accompanied by a company of Goldpact mercenaries. Kill her, grab [Nomad's Brigandine](/nomadsBrigandine/), then return to [Nungata](/nungata/). ## Journal {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="3" style="word-break:break-all" | Quests/Bounties/BOUNTY_TSK_Mystic.quest |- ! width="40px" | {{tooltip|ID|Objectives: 0, Descriptions: 10000, Addenda: 20000, End states: 30000, Alternate descriptions: 40000}} ! colspan="2" | Objectives |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''0''' | colspan="2" | '''Bounty - Beina''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10000 | Beina, a dwarf mystic responsible for conning or killing anyone who gets too close, has been seen on an island southwest of Hasongo. There's a handsome bounty on her head. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''1''' | colspan="2" | '''Kill Beina.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10001 | Beina sounds like the type to keep moving, but she's been seen tarrying around an island southwest of Hasongo. |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''2''' | colspan="2" | '''Return to Nungata.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10002 | Nungata should be grateful to know there's one fewer murderer roaming the islands. She can be found in Serpent's Crown in Neketaka. |- ! colspan="3" | Unused strings |- | rowspan="1" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''-''' | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 30001 | |- ! colspan="3" | End states |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30000 | I slew Beina and claimed the bounty reward from Nungata. |}
